skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Hi! I have  passionate front-end developer with a knack for creating beautiful and responsive user interfaces. I love turning ideas into reality through code and am always eager to learn new technologies and improve my skills.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Hi! I have dedicated back-end developer with a strong focus on Node.js,Next.js and others. I enjoy building scalable web applications and APIs, and I am always eager to learn new technologies and improve my skills.

skills.title: Database Managment System
skills.description: Hi! I have a passionate database management professional with expertise in MySQL, MongoDB, and various other database technologies.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: Hello! I have a passionate Webflow developer with over 2 years of experience in creating visually stunning and highly functional websites. My journey in web development began with a fascination for design and technology, which led me to specialize in Webflow. .

portfolio.title: MobileApp
portfolio.description: I am excited to showcase my latest mobile application, developed using Flutter, a powerful framework for building natively compiled applications for mobile, web, and desktop from a single codebase.
